Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18554256]Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25726(MIC=25 µM);Gram-positive bactria:Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=3 µM);Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC 900280(MIC=3 µM);Cancer:human hepatoma‐derived cells HepG2 (LC50=5 µM).
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria.Antifungal activity against Candida albicans.

Literature.Title: Design of potent, non-toxic antimicrobial agents based upon the naturally occurring frog skin peptides, ascaphin-8 and peptide XT-7.
Literature.Author: Conlon JM, Galadari S, Raza H, Condamine E.
